data.meta_description: A tribute to Ilayaraja, the legendary Indian composer

Born as Gnanathesikan on June 2, 1943, in Pannaipuram, Tamil Nadu, India, he is widely regarded as one of the greatest music composers of all time. Ilaiyaraaja started his music career in the 1970s and quickly rose to fame with his unique style of composing music. He has given music to more than 1000 films in multiple languages, including Tamil, Telugu, Hindi, Kannada, Malayalam and more. In the 1970s, he started composing music for Tamil films, and his unique style of music quickly caught the attention of the film industry.
